document.full_text: secretive north korea is scouring its universities for computer prodigies to send overseas for training as part of a plan to expand its cyber warfare unit, a defector said on wednesday, underscoring the increased risk of cyber attacks.
document.title: north korea hacker threat grows as cyber unit grows: defector
lines_and_colors: secretive north korea is scouring its universities for computer prodigies to send overseas for training as part of a plan to expand its cyber warfare unit, a defector said on wednesday, underscoring the increased risk of cyber attacks.
